duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately and efficiently cook and assemble dishes that meet culinary and aesthetic standards.
Prepare and maintain mise en place for dishes and uphold station cleanliness.
Handle, store, and rotate all food products properly.
Report to scheduled shifts, meetings, and events on time and ready to work.
Maintain a clean and sanitary workstation and area.
Responsible for bringing personal cutlery tools/knife roll.

education_certification.credential: Culinary degree preferred but not required. Food Handlers Certifications required at time of hire.
